dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A military parade in Astana is like a giant, intricate clock—everything has to be perfectly timed, and that means some gears have to pause.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A military parade in Astana is like a giant, intricate clock-everything has to be perfectly timed, and that means some gears have to pause.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and one of those gears is the airspace over the city. They're closing it for training flights from April 22nd to May 7th, every day between 10 AM and 1 PM.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and one of those gears is the airspace over the city. They're closing it for training flights from April twenty second to May seventh, every day between ten A M and one P M.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to information from the Ministry of Defense of the Republic of Kazakhstan, due to the preparation and holding of a military parade in Astana, from April 22 to May 7, 2025, between 10:00 AM and 1:00 PM, there will be temporary restrictions on the use of airspace in the city of Astana for military aviation training flights, the Ministry of Transport stated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's a pretty significant window, uh, especially for a couple weeks straight. I imagine that's gonna cause some disruptions for travelers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a pretty significant window, uh, especially for a couple weeks straight. I imagine that's gonna cause some disruptions for travelers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. The Ministry of Transport is advising passengers to check their flight statuses well in advance if they're flying in or out of Astana during that period.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. The Ministry of Transport is advising passengers to check their flight statuses well in advance if they're flying in or out of Astana during that period.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Passengers are advised to take these restrictions into account when planning their trips and to check the current status of their flights through airline and airport information services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It makes sense though, right? You can't have commercial flights mixing with military aircraft during such a precise operation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It makes sense though, right? You can't have commercial flights mixing with military aircraft during such a precise operation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh for sure. Safety has to come first, but it's still a headache for anyone with travel plans during those hours.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh for sure. Safety has to come first, but it's still a headache for anyone with travel plans during those hours.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And it's not just the day of the parade itself—it's the prep time too. All those rehearsals need clear airspace.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's not just the day of the parade itself-it's the prep time too. All those rehearsals need clear airspace.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to information from the Ministry of Defense of the Republic of Kazakhstan, due to the preparation and holding of a military parade in Astana, from April 22 to May 7, 2025, between 10:00 AM and 1:00 PM, there will be temporary restrictions on the use of airspace in the city of Astana for military aviation training flights, the Ministry of Transport stated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. So if you're flying around noon anytime in late April or early May next year, uh, double-check with your airline.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. So if you're flying around noon anytime in late April or early May next year, uh, double-check with your airline.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Good advice. Hopefully airlines are proactive about notifying people as we get closer to 2025.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Good advice. Hopefully airlines are proactive about notifying people as we get closer to twenty twenty five.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I'd they usually are pretty good about that, especially for something planned this far ahead.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I'd they usually are pretty good about that, especially for something planned this far ahead.
